dt: landlocked country in southern Europe; capital Belgrade {it}area{/it} 29,913 square miles (77,474 square kilometers), {it}population{/it} 7,078,000
Serbia was a constituent republic of Serbia and Montenegro 2003–06 and part of Yugoslavia before that (1946–2003).

shortdef: landlocked country in southern Europe; capital Belgrade area 29,913 square miles (77,474 square kilometers), population 7,078,000

dt: former country in southern Europe on the Balkan Peninsula; capital Belgrade {it}area{/it} 39,449 square miles (102,173 square kilometers)
Montenegro and Serbia became separately independent countries in 2006.

shortdef: former country in southern Europe on the Balkan Peninsula; capital Belgrade area 39,449 square miles (102,173 square kilometers)
